sentences.en: " This seems to lighten their mood a little.
sentences.cn: 他们才似乎也快乐些了.

sentences.en: Anthony felt the need to lighten the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 安东尼觉得有必要缓和一下气氛。

sentences.en: As the sky lightened, we were able to see where we were.
sentences.cn: 天色渐亮，我们能看清楚身处何地了。

sentences.en: Come on, lighten up! It was only a joke.
sentences.cn: 喂, 别紧张! 这只不过是开玩笑.

sentences.en: Come on, this is a party. Lighten up.
sentences.cn: 别这样，这是个聚会。高兴点。

sentences.en: equipment to lighten the load of domestic work
He did his best to lighten things up.
sentences.cn: 他尽力使局势生动起来.

sentences.en: He managed to lighten the generally lifeless debate at times.
sentences.cn: 他让这场总体很沉闷的辩论时不时迸出了些火花。

sentences.en: He tries to lighten his lectures with an occasional witticism.
sentences.cn: 他有时想用俏皮话使课堂活跃.

sentences.en: I told you at the beginning of this article that I needed to lighten up my bike without sacrificing my suspension.
sentences.cn: 在本文开始的部分，我告诉您我需要在不牺牲自行车避震系统的前提下，减轻自行车的重量。

sentences.en: If you are responsible for children, lighten the load by asking others to help.
sentences.cn: 如果你有抚养孩子的责任，可以请他人帮忙以减轻负担。

sentences.en: In sharing this secret you lighten your burden.
sentences.cn: 和别人分享这个秘密可以减轻自己的负担。

sentences.en: She took one of the parcels from her father to lighten his load.
sentences.cn: 她从父亲那儿拿过一个包以减轻他的负担。

sentences.en: She tried to lighten up her speech with a few jokes.
sentences.cn: 她讲了几个笑话以使讲话轻松愉快些.

sentences.en: The minister has persuaded the banks to lighten the burden of the foreign debt.
sentences.cn: 部长已经说服银行减轻外债负担。

sentences.en: The sky began to lighten after the storm.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨后天空开始放晴.

sentences.en: The sun was streaming in through the window, yet it did nothing to lighten his mood.
sentences.cn: 阳光透过窗户照进来，可是这也不能让他的心情开朗起来。

sentences.en: This will lighten your spirit and give you strength and motivation.
sentences.cn: 这样会减轻你的精神压力并会给你能力和动力。
